body:
I know I've submitted a PR to add several things in MFEM and also fixed the issues I think I see here. Nonetheless, I am trying to understand MFEM build failures due to `+parmetis` at this point and so am looking back at original package code...

Have a look at the MFEM package code on master...

https://github.com/LLNL/spack/blob/master/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/mfem/package.py

Am I missing something or are the lines testing 86, 118, 125 and 137 missing the `+` in the variant tags?

Next, is it right to have logic for a `+parmetis` when there is no `variant('parmetis'....)`?
title: Sanity check my take of MFEM on master
